markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Numb](/Feats.aspx?ID=3562) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 61</row>

**Archetype** [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182)

**Prerequisites**
[Zombie Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3557)

</column>

---

As your body continues to rot and putrefy, your senses deaden and your undead powers grow. You gain the [advanced undead benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1695), as well as a +1 circumstance bonus on saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) and pain effects. While your body is deteriorated, your numbness amplifies in two ways: the circumstance bonus from this feat increases to +2, and if you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion or pain effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Numb

summary_markdown: As your body continues to rot and putrefy, your senses deaden and your undead powers grow.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Standard" > Numb Source Book of the Dead pg. 61 Archetype Zombie Prerequisites Zombie Dedication --- As your body continues to rot and putrefy, your senses deaden and your undead powers grow. You gain the advanced undead benefits, as well as a +1 circumstance bonus on saving throws against emotion and pain effects. While your body is deteriorated, your numbness amplifies in two ways: the circumstance bonus from this feat increases to +2, and if you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion or pain effect, you get a critical success instead.
